remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided it is verified after engine start that the associated start valve is closed.

numlitem.para: During engine start, if EICAS caution message STARTER CUTOUT_ is displayed, comply with non-normal procedures.
If EICAS caution message STARTER CUTOUT_ is displayed after engine speed reaches 52% N2 , the start valve has failed to close. Maintenance action to replace or repair the start valve is required.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to Start Valve Open Light (P5): "START VALVE OPEN LIGHT INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: Should an inoperative Start Valve Open Light remain illuminated after confirmation that the associated start valve is closed, the PRV may remain commanded closed (due to failure of a start valve closed limit switch). Under this condition it is necessary to comply with the PRV inoperative and secured closed provisions of MEL item 36-11-8-1 or 36-11-8-2.
